title: Reporting people for saying ez/easy
body: I believe it's important to report everyone who says easy or ez or shows any other kind of bad player behavior. In my opinion they're the ones who actually fuel toxicity in league by showing disrespect for no particular reason. I've gotten several messages from the automated system letting me know that they've received the reports and none feel better than when its for those who show that base disrespect. I encourage anyone else who see's people say that to do the same and help reduce toxicity.

You all seem to misunderstand. I don't mind persay when people say it. I just enjoy reporting them for it because I figure if they're willing to do things like that they're probably toxic players in general and as such when I get a notification that riot has been notified.

As far as I know, saying easy when you did some good play as the same when somebody says "nice flash" after you flashed into a wall.
Its just regular shit talk, which is actually allowed in league.
Of course you want to lower the enemies morals.
But I think saying "gg ez" at the end of the game is like saying:,, Easy game you noobs."
It should be reportable.

It is a disrespectful phrase.Nevermind if the enemy team got shredded or your team. When I used to play over 5 years ago, we never said it. GG and everyone happy. That "ggez" came out during last 1-2 years I think. I agree, it fuels negativity into the game as a whole.I report it, in both teams when I see it.
The only way gg ez bothers me if someone says it after a 50 minute game. I mean, seriously 50 minutes, full build for everyone. It clearly wasn't ez.

i understand that "ez" can be a bitch after losing a game, but honestly, does it affect you? 
if they end the game, most of the time people move on and forget.
if they fail and screw up, you feel better and they feel like idiots.
So I never said I only report for those who say it who are on the opposing team. I report teammates who say it as well. I'm not discriminatory about reporting regarding it.
